```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
tbl_sol <- tibble::tibble(Nr = c(1, 2),
                          Date = c("2022-09-23",

                          Topic = c(
                           paste0("[Linear Algebra](", s_sol_url, "lbg_ex02_sol.pdf)", collapse = ""),

                          ))
knitr::kable(tbl_sol)
```
